options.title: Shirt - Dry cleaning
options.content:
Time to go out? Look your best with pristine garments dry-cleaned by our laundry experts!

 

How it works:

1. Pick-up: After you confirm your booking, our professional will collect your shirts, t-shirts, blouses, and tops and handle them with utmost care right from the start till the end to ensure that you have fresh & clean garments upon delivery.

Don't forget to write the instructions on the bag or in the comment box if you have any special instructions for us!

 

2. At the laundry: Our experts know what's best for each fabric! After thoroughly inspecting your items, our team might reach out to you if they find any defects with them before they begin the process.

Your clothing items will be cleaned by our highly skilled laundry experts and dried using non-abrasive equipment.

 

3. Drop-off: Your items will be delivered to you in a ready-to-wear condition within 48 hours at your preferred time for drop off!

 

Please note:

  • The service may be put on hold if any damage is observed upon inspection.
  • Charges may differ if the suit requires extra service than the standardized industry process, this will be informed to you in advance.
  • This price is for delivery within 48 hours.Our crew will be happy to assist with urgent requirements for a nominal additional charge.

Kindly contact our chat support for queries, and we'll help you out!

 

Frequently Asked Questions:

What is our deliver fees?

Pick-up and delivery is free of charge

Is there a minimum charge?

Yes, our minimum order total is 39 AED.

What if an item is misplaced or damaged?

In the rare case that an item is damaged by our cleaning process or has been lost by our service provider, we will be liable to pay

up to 5 times the value of the laundry charge for the item in question, provided that the concern in raised within 24 hours of laundry delivery.

What if an item isn't mentioned in the service list?

Our professionals can laundry and dry clean any item of clothing with the care it requires! In case the price isn't listed above, our professional will contact you to confirm the price for service before proceeding.

options.title: Iron - Medium (11 to 20 items)
options.content:
Running out of ready-to-wear clothes?

We've got you covered with our premium Laundry service.Get neatly ironed clothes in no time!

 

How it works:

1. Pick-up: After you confirm your booking, our professional will collect the clothing items in a bag. You can fill the bag with up to 20 clothes (opt for a Large bag for extra items).

Don't forget to write the instructions on the bag or in the comment box for your delicate items!

 

2. At the laundry: All the clothing items will be thoroughly inspected. Our team might reach out to you if they find any defects with your clothing.

All your clothes will be ironed, folded, and returned neatly.

 

3. Drop-off: Ironed clothes will be delivered to you within 48 hours at your preferred time for collection!

 

Why book us?

  • We process all batches of clothes separately, without mixing them with each other, making the process more hygienic.
  • The laundry is well segregated and washed according to their labels, which helps clothes last in great condition for longer.
  • All the clothes are steam ironed at 180–220° Celsius to ensure complete protection from bacteria & other viruses.

 

Frequently asked questions:

What is our deliver fees?

Pick-up and delivery is free of charge

Is there a minimum charge?

Yes, our minimum order total is 39 AED.

What if an item is misplaced or damaged?

In the rare case that an item is damaged by our cleaning process or has been lost by our service provider, we will be liable to pay

up to 10 times the value of the laundry charge for the item in question, provided that the concern in raised within 24 hours of laundry delivery.

What if an item isn't mentioned in the service list?

Our professionals can laundry and dry clean any item of clothing with the care it requires! In case the price isn't listed above, our professional will contact you to confirm the price for service before proceeding.

s the laundry pile of home linens stressing you out?

Complete your booking and get fresh & clean clothes in no time!

You can fill the bag with up to 15 Home linen items such as bedsheets , duvet covers , pillow covers , blankets , towels , bath robes. Comforters and Duvets will be charged additional.

Additional items will cost AED 7 per item.

Don't forget to write the instructions on the bag or in the comment box for your delicate items!

3. Drop-off: Laundered clothes will be delivered to you within 48 hours at your preferred time for drop off!

Delievery may take longer depending on drying time.

- We process all batches of clothes separately, without mixing them with each other, making the process more hygienic.

- During the wash, clothes are thoroughly sanitized with anti-bacterial laundry sanitizers. - We use heat and cool air technologies to dry the fabric, which helps in eliminating all the toxicants.

- All the itmes are steam ironed at 180–220° Celsius to ensure complete protection from bacteria & other viruses.

options.title: Iron - Medium (11 to 20 items)
options.content:
Running out of ready-to-wear clothes?

We've got you covered with our premium Laundry service.Get neatly ironed clothes in no time!

 

How it works:

1. Pick-up: After you confirm your booking, our professional will collect the clothing items in a bag. You can fill the bag with up to 20 clothes (opt for a Large bag for extra items).

Don't forget to write the instructions on the bag or in the comment box for your delicate items!

 

2. At the laundry: All the clothing items will be thoroughly inspected. Our team might reach out to you if they find any defects with your clothing.

All your clothes will be ironed, folded, and returned neatly.

 

3. Drop-off: Ironed clothes will be delivered to you within 48 hours at your preferred time for collection!

 

Why book us?

  • We process all batches of clothes separately, without mixing them with each other, making the process more hygienic.
  • The laundry is well segregated and washed according to their labels, which helps clothes last in great condition for longer.
  • All the clothes are steam ironed at 180–220° Celsius to ensure complete protection from bacteria & other viruses.

options.title: Other Items
options.content:
Dry cleaned and fresh clothes delivered  back to you in 48 hours!

Service charge may increase from AED 39 if cost of dry cleaning the item given is higher. 

Please refer to the list below for items that we can dry clean and their prices.

  • Shorts - AED 09
  • Vests - AED 15
  • Lungi - AED 10
  • Party Dresses - AED 25
  • Ghutra or Scarf or Ties - AED 07
  • Lingerie - Delicates - AED 07
  • Cardigans and Winter wear - AED 11

Our professionals will contact you if the items are unwashable, need delicate care, or if there is a price variation.

Items found to be defective during pre-service check will be returned as they will be unprocessed.

For further information, please write to us at wecare@justlife.com

options.title: Sedan Silver Combo
options.content:
Duration: 40 mins

What's included:

  • Cleaning the exterior and interior of the vehicle with a waterless solution.
  • Wiping the wheels and tires.
  • Wiping and polishing the steering wheel.
  • Wiping and polishing the dashboard.
  • Cleaning windows inside out
  • Wiping and polishing the panels.
  • Eco-Friendly Service with the least water spillage.
  • All wiping is done with microfibre towels for long-lasting shine.


Note:

  • Please note that permits are to be arranged by the customer. In case the professional couldn’t work due to a permit issue - full-service will be charged.
  • Please arrange key access for all interior services. The professional will only be able to wait for a max of 15 mins for interior access and will only do exterior service in case the access issue persists.
  • Please note that any valuables left inside the car during an interior service are the sole responsibility of the vehicle owner.

How it works:
1. Your first session will take place on the time and date you choose while buying the package
2. You can schedule future sessions from your package by clicking on the bookings tab and going to Active packages

4. Future sessions can be re-scheduled or canceled at any time

1. Sessions will only be valid for 3 months from the date of the booking
2. Upon canceling a session, a new session will be automatically created. However, a refund will not be issued.

options.title: 6-Session Sedan Full Cleaning
options.content:
Duration: 40 mins

What's included:

- Cleaning the exterior and interior of the vehicle with a waterless solution.
- Wiping the wheels and tires.
- Wiping and polishing the steering wheel.
- Wiping and polishing the dashboard.
- Cleaning windows inside out.
- Wiping and polishing the panels.
- Eco-Friendly Service with minimal water spillage.
- All wiping is done with microfibre towels for long-lasting shine.

How it works:
1. Your first session will take place on the time and date you choose while buying the package
2. You can schedule future sessions from your package by clicking on the bookings tab and going to Active packages
3. Under Active packages you will be able to see the package expiry date, No. of sessions left and A redeem button which you can click to create your future booking
4. Future sessions can be re-scheduled or canceled at any time

Please note:
1. Sessions will only be valid for 3 months from the date of the booking
2. Upon canceling a session, a new session will be automatically created. However, a refund will not be issued.

​Note:
- Permits are to be arranged by the customer. If the professional couldn’t work due to a permit issue, full-service fee will be charged.
- Please arrange key access for all interior services. The professional will only be able to wait for a max of 15 mins for interior access and will only do exterior service if the access issue persists.
- Please note that any valuables left inside the car during an interior service are the sole responsibility of the vehicle owner.
options.description: Schedule a weekly or bi-weekly spruce with our Sedan interior and exterior cleaning package.

Basic home cleaning, Dusting, mopping, sweeping, vacuuming, moving light types of furniture and cleaning underneath it, bed making and changing linens, washing utensils and organizing cabinets, and emptying the trash.

  • Scrubbing machines are not included.
  • External window/glass cleaning.

options.title: Sneakers
options.content:
Service Description

Our trained professionals will clean all your sneakers by hand using quality materials to have them look as good as new.

This is a delicate hand wash process to make sure the sneaker material remains intact while all the dust and stains are removed.

Drying time can be up to 72 hours or more as we pay attention to detail and care for your beloved kicks. Delivery may be delayed in such cases.


How it works

1. Pick-up: After you confirm your booking, our professional will collect your sneakers and handle them with utmost care right from the start till the end to ensure that you have an immaculate pair upon delivery.

Please don't forget to mention on the bag or in the comment box if you have any special instructions for us!

2. At the workshop: Our experts know what's best for each sneaker fabric! After thoroughly inspecting your items, our team might reach out to you to notify you of any defects with your sneakers before they begin the process.

Your shoes will then be cleaned by our highly skilled experts and dried using non-abrasive equipment.

3. Drop-off: Your sneakers will be delivered to you once they are completely dry. This may take up to 72 hours.



FAQ's

1. What are our delivery fees?

Pick-up and delivery are free of charge!

2. Can I book any day of the week?

We are happy to serve you any day between Monday to Friday.

No pick-ups and drop-offs will be available on Saturday and Sunday.

3. Can all types of stains be removed?

Our service is specialized in shoe cleaning all kinds of stains.

However, the service provider reserves the right to refuse to clean any shoes and cannot guarantee the removal of stains caused by wine, coffee, blood, oil/grease & paint stains, material/dye bleeding) and pre-existing damage or defects.

The service provider is not responsible for any damage to any non-cleanable items.


4. What if an item is misplaced or damaged?

We are happy to compensate 3 times the charge for shoe cleaning regardless of brand or condition, with an original receipt and proof of payment, the replacement value of the shoes is as follows:
- 75% if purchased under 30 days.
- 50% from 31-120 days of purchase.
- 25% after 1 year of purchase.
Should payment for this occur, the items will become the property the service provides and will not be returned to the customer.

The service provider is not liable for reimbursing new items purchased by the customer to replace lost or damaged items. We shall have no obligation to refund any amount paid by the customer, but if it may choose to do so in its sole and absolute discretion.

5. Will my shoes be repaired?
This is a dedicated shoe-cleaning service. No repair will be carried out.
options.description: Get your favorite pair of sneakers cleaned professionally by hand! Delivery time 3 - 4 days .

options.content:
Experience a slice of Bali with a rejuvenating massage in your own home, delivered by our expert Balinese therapists. They bring with them the tranquil essence of Bali, blending ancient healing techniques with soothing aromas for a refreshing escape.

Delight in the blend of gentle stretches, acupressure, and traditional massage strokes as our therapists work to ease muscle tension and balance your energy, fostering a deep sense of tranquility and well-being.

  • Sanitized massage bed
  • Massage oils & relaxing atmosphere
  • Disposable sheets
  • Cleansed towels

 

Note: 

 

  • For females only
  • This service is not suitable for pregnant women, individuals post-surgery, or those suffering from a sprain or major injury

options.title: Hijama/Cupping Therapy
options.content:
Cupping is used to treat a variety of health conditions. It involves placing cups at certain points on the skin. The practitioner then creates suction in the cups, which pulls against the skin.

DHA Licensed Specialists:
Our DHA-licensed specialist will come equipped with all the necessary personal protective equipment.

Benefits:
Cupping Therapy relieves pain, helps with chronic health issues, and improves circulation, blood, and lymph circulation. Cupping may ease the symptoms of:

  •  Arthritis,
  •  Back pain, neck pain, knee pain, and shoulder pain.
  •  Breathing problems, such as asthma.
  •  Carpal tunnel syndrome.
  •  Headaches and migraines.
  •  High blood pressure (hypertension).
  •  Migraines.
  •  Anxiety and depression.
  •  Bronchial congestion caused by allergies and asthma.
  •  Varicose veins.


Safety Guaranteed:
Our DHA-licensed specialists strictly follow the guidelines from the healthcare authorities' protocol to ensure safety, health, and hygiene are upheld to the highest standards.
options.description: Improve the flow of energy in your body, decrease toxins, and facilitate healing with cupping/ Hijama treatment.

options.service_attribute_title: Womens Spa Cupping Hijama
Womens Spa Cupping Hijama
Womens Spa Cupping Hijama
Womens Spa Cupping Hijama
Womens Spa Cupping Hijama
Womens Spa Cupping Hijama

options.title: Whole Body Fire Cupping Session
options.content:
A Whole Body Fire Cupping Session is a type of therapy that involves placing cups made of glass, bamboo or silicone on various parts of the body to create suction.

DHA Licensed Specialists:
Our DHA-licensed specialist will come equipped with all the necessary personal protective equipment.

What's Included:

  • Assessment:
    The practitioner will assess the patient's medical history, current condition, and areas of discomfort or pain to determine the appropriate areas for cupping.
  • Cup placement:
    The practitioner will place cups on various parts of the patient's body, typically on the back, neck, and shoulders, using suction to create a vacuum. The cups may be left in place for a few minutes or moved around to different areas.
  • Heat application:
    In traditional fire cupping, the cups are heated with a flame before being placed on the skin to create the vacuum. In some cases, cups may also be used with a suction pump, without heat.

Treatment duration: 45 Minutes

  • Benefits:
    Cupping is thought to increase blood flow and stimulate the immune system, promoting healing and reducing inflammation. It is also believed to promote relaxation and reduce stress.
  • Aftercare:
    The practitioner may provide the patient with aftercare instructions, such as avoiding exposure to cold or wind, keeping the treated areas warm, and staying hydrated.This therapy is designed to promote physical and mental wellness and is used as an alternative or complementary therapy to other medical treatments. It can be effective for a range of conditions, including chronic pain, muscle tension, and stress. However, it is important to consult with a trained practitioner before trying any new type of therapy.


Safety Guaranteed:
Our DHA-licensed specialists strictly follow the guidelines from the healthcare authorities' protocol to ensure safety, health, and hygiene are upheld to the highest standards.
options.description: Are you looking for a unique and effective way to improve your health and well-being? Our whole-body fire cupping session is a traditional therapy that uses heat and suction to promote relaxation, pain relief, and detoxification.

options.title: Whole Body Sliding Cupping Session
options.content:
A Whole Body Sliding Cupping Session is a type of therapy that involves placing cups made of glass, bamboo, or silicone on various parts of the body to create suction and then sliding them along the skin.

DHA Licensed Specialists:
Our DHA-licensed specialist will come equipped with all the necessary personal protective equipment.

What's Included:

  • Assessment: The practitioner will assess the patient's medical history, current condition, and areas of discomfort or pain to determine the appropriate areas for cupping.
  • Cup placement: The practitioner will place cups on various parts of the patient's body, typically on the back, neck, and shoulders, using suction to create a vacuum. The cups are then slid along the skin, creating a massage-like effect.
  • Lubrication: The practitioner may apply a lubricant such as oil or lotion to the patient's skin before sliding the cups.
  • Benefits: Sliding cupping is thought to increase blood flow, promote relaxation, and reduce muscle tension. It is also believed to promote the release of toxins from the body.
  • Aftercare: The practitioner may provide the patient with aftercare instructions, such as avoiding exposure to cold or wind, keeping the treated areas warm, and staying hydrated.
  • Treatment duration: 60 Minutes
    This therapy is designed to promote physical and mental wellness and is used as an alternative or complementary therapy to other medical treatments. It can be effective for a range of conditions, including chronic pain, muscle tension, and stress. However, it is important to consult with a trained practitioner before trying any new type of therapy.


Safety Guaranteed:
Our DHA-licensed specialists strictly follow the guidelines from the healthcare authorities' protocol to ensure safety, health, and hygiene are upheld to the highest standards.

options.content:
Experience a slice of Bali with a rejuvenating massage in your own home, delivered by our expert Balinese therapists. They bring with them the tranquil essence of Bali, blending ancient healing techniques with soothing aromas for a refreshing escape.

Delight in the blend of gentle stretches, acupressure, and traditional massage strokes as our therapists work to ease muscle tension and balance your energy, fostering a deep sense of tranquility and well-being.

What's included:

  • 60 minutes Balinese massage
  • Sanitized massage bed
  • Massage oils & relaxing atmosphere
  • Disposable sheets
  • Cleansed towels

options.title: Hijama/Cupping Therapy
options.content:
Cupping is used to treat a variety of health conditions. It involves placing cups at certain points on the skin. The practitioner then creates suction in the cups, which pulls against the skin.

DHA Licensed Specialists:
Our DHA-licensed specialist will come equipped with all the necessary personal protective equipment.

Benefits:
Cupping Therapy relieves pain, helps with chronic health issues, and improves circulation, blood, and lymph circulation. Cupping may ease the symptoms of:

  •  Arthritis,
  •  Back pain, neck pain, knee pain, and shoulder pain.
  •  Breathing problems, such as asthma.
  •  Carpal tunnel syndrome.
  •  Headaches and migraines.
  •  High blood pressure (hypertension).
  •  Migraines.
  •  Anxiety and depression.
  •  Bronchial congestion caused by allergies and asthma.
  •  Varicose veins.


Safety Guaranteed:
Our DHA-licensed specialists strictly follow the guidelines from the healthcare authorities' protocol to ensure safety, health, and hygiene are upheld to the highest standards.
options.description: Improve the flow of energy in your body, decrease toxins, and facilitate healing with cupping/ Hijama treatment.

options.title: Whole Body Fire Cupping Session
options.content:
A Whole Body Fire Cupping Session is a type of therapy that involves placing cups made of glass, bamboo or silicone on various parts of the body to create suction.

DHA Licensed Specialists:
Our DHA-licensed specialist will come equipped with all the necessary personal protective equipment.

What's Included:

  • Assessment:
    The practitioner will assess the patient's medical history, current condition, and areas of discomfort or pain to determine the appropriate areas for cupping.
  • Cup placement:
    The practitioner will place cups on various parts of the patient's body, typically on the back, neck, and shoulders, using suction to create a vacuum. The cups may be left in place for a few minutes or moved around to different areas.
  • Heat application:
    In traditional fire cupping, the cups are heated with a flame before being placed on the skin to create the vacuum. In some cases, cups may also be used with a suction pump, without heat.

Treatment duration: 45 Minutes

  • Benefits:
    Cupping is thought to increase blood flow and stimulate the immune system, promoting healing and reducing inflammation. It is also believed to promote relaxation and reduce stress.
  • Aftercare:
    The practitioner may provide the patient with aftercare instructions, such as avoiding exposure to cold or wind, keeping the treated areas warm, and staying hydrated.This therapy is designed to promote physical and mental wellness and is used as an alternative or complementary therapy to other medical treatments. It can be effective for a range of conditions, including chronic pain, muscle tension, and stress. However, it is important to consult with a trained practitioner before trying any new type of therapy.


Safety Guaranteed:
Our DHA-licensed specialists strictly follow the guidelines from the healthcare authorities' protocol to ensure safety, health, and hygiene are upheld to the highest standards.
options.description: Are you looking for a unique and effective way to improve your health and well-being? Our whole-body fire cupping session is a traditional therapy that uses heat and suction to promote relaxation, pain relief, and detoxification.

options.title: Whole Body Sliding Cupping Session
options.content:
A Whole Body Sliding Cupping Session is a type of therapy that involves placing cups made of glass, bamboo, or silicone on various parts of the body to create suction and then sliding them along the skin.

DHA Licensed Specialists:
Our DHA-licensed specialist will come equipped with all the necessary personal protective equipment.

What's Included:

  • Assessment: The practitioner will assess the patient's medical history, current condition, and areas of discomfort or pain to determine the appropriate areas for cupping.
  • Cup placement: The practitioner will place cups on various parts of the patient's body, typically on the back, neck, and shoulders, using suction to create a vacuum. The cups are then slid along the skin, creating a massage-like effect.
  • Lubrication: The practitioner may apply a lubricant such as oil or lotion to the patient's skin before sliding the cups.
  • Benefits: Sliding cupping is thought to increase blood flow, promote relaxation, and reduce muscle tension. It is also believed to promote the release of toxins from the body.
  • Aftercare: The practitioner may provide the patient with aftercare instructions, such as avoiding exposure to cold or wind, keeping the treated areas warm, and staying hydrated.
  • Treatment duration: 60 Minutes
    This therapy is designed to promote physical and mental wellness and is used as an alternative or complementary therapy to other medical treatments. It can be effective for a range of conditions, including chronic pain, muscle tension, and stress. However, it is important to consult with a trained practitioner before trying any new type of therapy.


Safety Guaranteed:
Our DHA-licensed specialists strictly follow the guidelines from the healthcare authorities' protocol to ensure safety, health, and hygiene are upheld to the highest standards.
options.description: Do you suffer from muscle tension, soreness, or fatigue? Our sliding cupping session can help alleviate your symptoms and promote better circulation and range of motion.

options.title: Classic Tan
options.content:
Duration: 20mins

Pre-Tanning Care:

  • Shave and exfoliate the night before your tanning session for the best results!
  • Do not shave, wax, get a mani-pedi, get an eyelash or hair extension, or get laser hair removal on the day of your tanning session.
  • Do not use conditioner before your session, use mild shower gel and oil-free scrub. Avoid dove products or anything with moisturizers.

 

What is included:

  • Service available for both ladies and gentlemen. 
  • An organic classic tanning solution will be used.
  • Wide variety of organic tanning, 8 shades/solutions to choose from.
  • Development time is 6 hours for natural, and 8-10 hours for medium to deep dark shades.
  • Wash the solution after your desired color has been achieved.
  • Tanning solution will last 7-10 days approximately.
  • Service is applicable for men and women ages 17yrs old and above.
  • For lactating women, please consult your Doctor first before booking your tanning session.

 

Post Tanning Care: 

  • Do not apply deodorant, makeup, or any other products to your body after your tanning session.
  • Put on dark loosely fit clothes after your session, tight clothes can rub or smear bronzers, especially on your knees, chest, and waist.
  • Flip Flops and slippers are the best footwear after your tanning.
options.description: Summer is here! Get the perfect tan with our Classic Tan Service.

options.service_attribute_title: Spray Tanning Classic Tan
Spray Tanning Classic Tan
Spray Tanning Classic Tan
Spray Tanning Classic Tan

Spray Tanning Classic Tan

options.title: Handyman Book Hourly
options.content:
You can book a handyman for:

  • Furniture installation.
  • TV installation.
  • Curtain hanging.
  • Drilling.
  • Door installation and repair.
  • Any other handyman service you may need.

Additional information:

  • Visit charge is AED 129, which covers the first hour of work. (Does not include material)
  • Any additional material required including cables, fittings etc., will be charged separately
  • Visit charge will not be refunded if additional material quotation is not approved
  • Cancellation of the booking up to 2 hours from the start of the appointment will result in a 30 minute service fee.
  • AED 65 for every additional 30 minutes of service after the first hour.
  • Visit charges will be adjusted against the final bill if further services are required.
  • Building or premises entry permits need to arranged by the customer. The full service fees will be charged in case the professional are unable to carry out the service due to entry permit

options.title: Window Sealing
options.content:
Sealing off any vulnerable doors and windows to avoid leaks and flooding during rains.

What's Included:

  • Using high-quality materials and techniques, we seal gaps and cracks effectively to prevent water penetration.
  • Our sealing solutions ensure comprehensive protection.
  • Our experienced technicians handle the sealing process with precision and care.


Additional information:

  • Charges are on hourly basis and does not include door/window repair.
  • Sealant will be of basic colours (black/white).
  • Any additional repairs required will be quoted seperately.
  • Charges will not be refunded if additional repair quotation is not approved.
  • Cancellation of the booking up to 2 hours from the start of the appointment will not be refunded.
  • Building or villa entry permits need to arranged by the customer in advance.
  • The inspection charges will not be refunded in case the professional are unable to carry out the service due to entry permit.
options.description: Protect your home from water damage and flood with our professional sealing service!

options.title: Furniture Installation
options.content:
What's Included:
Furniture assembling and repair of all kinds.

How it's done:

  • Our qualified professional will visit with the primary tools required to assemble the furniture.
  • He will then go through the instructions manual to plan his steps. Please allow the expert sufficient time to read and understand the instructions manual well as quality is key.
  • In case you don't have an instruction manual, No worries, our team is experienced with furniture assembling however it may take some more time than expected as we believe in quality service.

Kindly note:

  • Heavy furniture may take more time and require additional manpower to be called in.
  • Visit charge is AED 129, which covers the first hour of work. AED 65 for every additional 30 minutes of service after the first 30 min.
  • Any additional material required will be charged separately.
  • Visit charge will not be refunded if additional material quotation is not approved
  • Material sourcing may take up to 24 - 48 hours subject to availability. (Additional cost)
  • For all jobs, kindly note that full access to the property is required. A full-service fee will still be charged in case the professional is returned due to a permit issue.

options.title: 6 Sessions- Handyman Callout
options.content:
What's Included:
6 convenient callout handyman sessions

How it's done:
- Our qualified professional will visit and understand your requirements.
- You will be advised of any complications or additional material that needs to be bought to achieve desired results. Buying the materials requires an additional cost.
- Once he receives your go-ahead, he will begin the process.

How it works:
1. Your first session will take place on the time and date you choose while buying the package.
2. You can schedule future sessions from your package by clicking on the bookings tab and going to “Active Packages”.
3. Under Active packages you will be able to see the package expiry date, number of sessions left and a “redeem” button which you can click to create your future booking.
4. Future sessions can be re-scheduled or canceled at any time.

Kindly note:
- The package is valid for 6 months from the date of purchase.
- Any additional material required will be charged separately to the booking.
- Future sessions can be re-scheduled or canceled at any time (No refund will be provided).
- Upon canceling a session, a new session will be automatically created. However, a refund will not be issued.
- Heavy mountings may take more time and require additional manpower to be called in.
- In case the wall is not suited for mounting, our professional will raise this concern in advance and will proceed as per your consent.
- Material sourcing may take up to 24 - 48hrs subject to availability. (Additional cost)
- For all jobs, kindly note that full access to the property is required. A full-service fee will still be charged in case the professional is returned due to a permit issue.
options.description: Say goodbye to the hassle of finding a handyman each time a problem arises. You get six sessions with our skilled and experienced handymen.

options.title: Studio
options.content:
Duration: 3 hours

What is included:

  • Our service experts will visit your premises with necessary equipment (paint, rollers, brushes, floor plastics) to refresh your home .The spots that do not require paint touch-ups will be covered with masking tape and the floor will be covered to prevent stains.The experts will guide you throughout and will inform you of the time-line of the process.
  • The painting service is only valid for the walls, and not for the ceiling, balconies and exteriors. You can check our add-on section when booking to add on the ceiling painting option.
  • We use premium paints (standard white or off white), separate charges will be incurred if you wish to choose from our colour pallete.
  • The price will also differ if you have a coloured wall and wish to re-colour it, which will be quoted at the visit.


Note:

  • This service is for Unfurnished properties, furnished properties will be priced based on inspection
  • Changing from a darker existing wall color to white or off-white will involve an additional charge, due to the need for additional coats of paint

options.title: 500 to 1000 Gallons
options.content:
Why is it important?

- There are a lot of health benefits for cleaning your water tanks.
- With time, numerous types of bacteria, algae, fungi, mold can be present in water storage.
- Water tank cleaning in UAE is an extremely important part of water hygiene due to the high temperature.
- As per Dubai Municipality authorities, your water tank must be cleaned annually.

What are the health benefits?

- Various skin issues can be avoided
- No more bad hair day - our hair needs filtered and soft water for rinsing and cleaning, because the alternative means dry, unmoisturized hair along with a flaky scalp
- Water coming from a dirty tank contains many types of germs that can infect you and your family.

What is included in service?

- Our professional will visit your place & examine your underground tank.
- Examine the condition of your tank and give you a timeline of the job.
- The professional will flush the whole tank and clean it with Dubai Municipality approved Chemicals
- Wash the tank again and flush the bad water.
- Finally will fill your tank with fresh water for your consumption

Note: This is a full day job and may extend to next day in some cases.
options.description: Don't let bacteria settle-down in your water tanks, for more information click.

options.title: 3 Seater Sofa Cleaning - 3 Sessions
options.content:
Duration: approximately 40 - 45 mins.
Package validity: 6 months
Note: Each session of the sofa cleaning service is designed to cater to one 3-seater sofa. If additional items are required to be serviced during the session, the booking amount will be topped up based on individual prices.

What's included in the service?
- Dry vacuuming and wiping of the 3 seater sofa.
- Soft brushing to remove dust.
- Wet cleaning and scrubbing with specialized detergents.
- Wet vacuuming to speed up the drying process.

Booking Process:
- Your first session will take place on the date and time chosen at the time of buying the package.
- After placing the order, you can find “Active Packages” in the bookings tab.
- Click “Redeem” to book your future sessions from Package Detail Page.
- Book your sessions within 6 months from the date of the package purchase.

Sessions Rescheduling and Cancellations:
- Upon canceling a session, you will be eligible for an additional booking within package validity.
- You can reschedule based on your preferred time and dates.

Please note:
- Our crew is trained to take pictures of pre-existing stains.
- Justlife does not take the liability to remove stains such as wine, blood. and animal waste. While the crew will imply the best efforts for its removal, these stains may persist.
- Your sofa may be wet for up to 4 - 6 hours after the cleaning.
- Machine intensity and detergents used will vary based on what is most appropriate for the sofa

options.title: King size mattress cleaning - 3 sessions
options.content:
Duration: approximately 60 mins
Package validity: 6 months
Note: Each session of the sofa cleaning service is designed to cater to one king-size mattress. If additional items are required to be serviced during the session, the booking amount will be topped up based on individual prices.

What's included in the service?
- Dry vacuuming and wiping of the mattress.
- Soft brushing to remove dust.
- Wet cleaning and scrubbing with specialized detergents.
- Wet vacuuming to speed up the drying process.

Booking Process:
- Your first session will take place on the date and time chosen at the time of buying the package.
- After placing the order, you can find “Active Packages” in the bookings tab.
- Click “Redeem” to book your future sessions from Package Detail Page.
- Book your sessions within 6 months from the date of the package purchase.

Sessions Rescheduling and Cancellations:
- Upon canceling a session, you will be eligible for an additional booking within package validity.
- You can reschedule based on your preferred time and dates.

Please note:
- Our crew is trained to take pictures of pre-existing stains.
- Justlife does not take the liability to remove stains such as wine, blood, and animal waste. While the crew will imply the best efforts for its removal, these stains may persist.
- Furniture may be wet for up to 12 hours after the cleaning.
- Machine intensity and detergents used will vary based on what is most appropriate for the fabric.
options.description: Super saver - eradicate dust mites and debris regularly for overall well-being.  Complimentary pillow cleaning for two pillows during each session.

options.title: Small up to 9sqm
options.content:
Service Duration: 45 minutes

How to measure the curtain's size?

Measure the complete size of the curtain fabric from one end to end to get the closest possible size. The frame of the window/ door does not determine the size of curtain. A set of curtains is considered two curtains.

What is included :

  • Removal of dirt, debris and dust through dry vacuuming
  • Providing the necessary cleaning equipment. 
  • Using curtain friendly cleaning materials.

Style & Fabric Included:

  • Roller Blinds
  • Roman Blinds
  • Silk / Chiffon Curtain.

 

Note:The estimated time for cleaning is 1 hour, however a minimum of 12 hours drying time is recommended for best results.

options.title: Studio
options.content:
Detailed cleaning of all surfaces in the living room, kitchen, and bathroom including dusting wiping, and disinfection using top-quality materials.

Duration: 180 minutes

What's included :

  • Living Room ​

- Dusting and wiping of all surfaces that are accessible by hand or using a standard ladder.

- Wiping of cupboards, shelving units, and decorative items. -Removing webs and old residue from nooks and corners.

- Dusting and vacuuming all furniture and upholstery. (Please note shampooing of furniture is not included in this service)

- Arranging sofa cushions and bed linen.

- Cupboard cleaning outside and inside. (Inside cleaning is only done upon approval).

-  All contents of the cupboards are placed back as they were. If organizing the cupboard is required please request it in the instructions.

- If requested, wall stains can be removed if paint is washable. Professionals will not proceed with wall stain removal if there’s a risk of damaging the paint.

  • Kitchen and Store

- Wiping cabinets and drawers and placing items back inside.

- Cleaning all appliances such as fridge, cooking range, washing machine, etc.

- Wiping, degreasing, and limescale removal from kitchen appliances.

  • Bathroom and Tiled Areas

- Extensively scrubbing floors, tiled walls, and fittings. Grout removal using special detergents.

- Wiping all mirrors, glass, decorative furniture, and ceramic fixtures with good quality microfiber and detergents.

- Cleaning cabinets from outside. (Inside cleaning is only done upon approval).

  • Balcony

- Wiping glass and safely reachable areas with a ladder.

- Wiping the railings.

- Washing and mopping floor with water.

- Dusting and wiping of outdoor furniture.

  • Windows ​

- Internal wiping of windows and window frames.

- Wiping of glass and safely reachable areas with ladder internally.

Other - Dusting and wiping of all doors, switches and sockets. - External wiping of all AC vents.

Please note the following :

- Please make sure to arrange entry permits in advance.

-  Please inform the crew if cupboard contents need to be organized.

-  Any special instructions may or may not be catered to depending on the scope of work and crew schedule.

- Our agents will be happy to assist in case of such queries.

- You will get the best results in unfurnished homes. It’s the perfect service for moving in/out!

- Outdoor sheds, storage areas and garden areas are not included in this service.

*We also offer the below services by top-rated professionals to ensure a hygienic clean home.

Furniture Cleaning: Service includes vacuuming, shampooing and stain removal of all upholstery such as sofas, mattresses, carpets and curtains. Please visit the link below for further details. https://www.justlife.com/en-AE/furniture-cleaning/checkout/flex?step=2

AC Cleaning: General duct or coil cleaning of AC units. Please visit the link below for further details: https://www.justlife.com/en-AE/ac_cleaning_at_home/checkout/flex?step=2
options.description: Have your studio looking brand new with deep and thorough cleaning in 180 minutes

options.title: AC Inspection
options.content:
What's included in our AC Inspection:

This initial service is solely an inspection, and subsequently, you may choose to schedule the AC cleaning or maintenance service of your preference at a later stage.

Comprehensive Visual Inspection: Our expert technicians will examine your AC unit inside and out, checking for any visible signs of damage, wear, or aging.

Air Duct Assessment: We'll inspect and evaluate the condition of your air ducts to ensure they're clean and promoting healthy indoor air quality.

Thorough Thermostat Check: Our team will verify the accuracy of your thermostat settings and calibrate them if needed, ensuring optimal comfort control.

Refrigerant Level Measurement: Proper refrigerant levels are vital for effective cooling. We'll measure and assess the refrigerant levels in your system.

Drainage tray Inspection: We'll examine the condensate drain line, making sure it's clear of any clogs or blockages that could lead to water damage or system malfunctions.

Cooling Performance Analysis: Our technicians will evaluate the overall cooling performance of your AC system

Don't miss out on this limited-time opportunity to ensure your AC system is running at its best!

Please note:

- This is only an inspection, following which you will need to book the ac cleaning or maintenance service
- This service will not be used to resolve any issues or malfunctions with your air conditioning that you may already be experiencing.
- If any defects are found in your unit the professional will guide you accordingly for additional charges.
- Permits need to be arranged by the client, cancellation of service due to permit issues will not receive a revisit
options.description: Avail our premium AC inspection service at a minimal cost of 49 Dirhams!

options.service_attribute_title: Free AC Inspection
Free AC Inspection

options.title: Duct & Filter Cleaning (1 Unit)
options.content:
Duration: 60 mins/ Thermostat

What's included in the service?
- Spraying the filters to remove dust, sand, and dirt and sanitize them.
- Cleaning the indoor filters, grills, and AC trays.
- Wiping the vents properly to remove dust and sanitize it.
- Deep Cleaning of dirt, debris, and other contaminants found in AC duct.
- Cleaning and sanitizing your AC air ducts using machines and vacuums.
- Wiping and sanitizing the ducts.
- Free inspection for any other issues in the AC
- 45-Day Service Warranty: Should the same issue reoccur or persist within 45 days following your service, we are committed to revisiting and resolving the matter at no additional cost. Please note that this warranty only covers issues that relate to the original booking and does not extend to new or unrelated maintenance and repairs.

The importance of this service:
It's highly recommended to get your AC cleaned regularly as it has health benefits since a well-cleaned AC will provide better air quality to your home. It reduces the risk of asthma and any respiratory conditions that you may develop due to AC cleaning neglect.


How do I know the number of units I have?
It's simple, you have to count the thermostat/ AC controlling units at your home and you will know how many units you have in your home.

Service procedure step-by-step.

- The professional will prepare the area for cleaning by covering the area with plastic sheets or cloth.
- The AC will be turned off from the main unit before the work commences.
- The following will be cleaned and sanitized: the filters, the grills and vents, and the drainage tray.
- Air Duct cleaning equipment which includes high-pressure vacuuming will be used.
- The professional will remove and wash all terminals using water and sanitize them.
- High-pressure air (air-wicks forward, reverse, and sidewinder method), completed with a specialized agitation power brush to clean the duct with dirt and debris.

Please note:
- This service should not be used to resolve any issues or malfunctions with your air conditioning that you may already be experiencing. This is only for servicing.
- If any defects are found in your unit the professional will guide you accordingly for additional charges.
- Permits need to be arranged by the client, cancellation of service due to permit issues will be charged as a 30-minute fee for service time.
options.description: Get a 11% Discount and maximize the air quality at your home with a profound cleaning of the AC Duct & AC Unit as per unit, limited-time offer.

Please note that this warranty only covers issues that relate to the original booking and does not extend to new or unrelated maintenance and repairs

The importance of this service:
It's highly recommended to get your AC cleaned regularly as it has health benefits since a well-cleaned AC will provide better air quality to your home. It reduces the risk of asthma and any respiratory conditions that you may develop due to AC cleaning neglect.


How do I know the number of units I have?
It's simple, you have to count the thermostat/ AC controlling units at your home and you will know how many units you have in your home.

Service procedure step-by-step.
- The professional will prepare the area for cleaning by covering the area with plastic sheets or cloth.
- The AC will be turned off from the main unit before the work commences.
- The following will be cleaned and sanitized: the filters, the grills and vents, and the drainage tray.
- Air Duct cleaning equipment which includes high-pressure vacuuming will be used.
- The professional will remove and wash all terminals using water and sanitize them.
- High-pressure air (air-wicks forward, reverse, and sidewinder method), completed with a specialized agitation power brush to clean the duct with dirt and debris.

Please note:
- This service should not be used to resolve any issues or malfunctions with your air conditioning that you may already be experiencing. This is only for servicing.
- If any defects are found in your unit the professional will guide you accordingly for additional charges.
- Permits need to be arranged by the client, cancellation of service due to permit issues will be charged as a 30-minute fee for service time.

options.title: 2 Bedroom - External
options.content:
Duration: Approximately 3 hours

Shiny & spotless windows are key to a fresh-looking home and excellent sunlight exposure.

Scaffolding:

- Additional charge of 130 AED upon approval.

- For windows higher than 15 feet and big villas we recommend the use of scaffolding for perfectly clean windows and window frames.

- The use of scaffolding is perfect for areas that are not reachable via extension pipes and ensures every nook and corner of your window has been cleaned.

- Based on your villa the crew will advise the use of scaffolding.



The Process:

Step 1: Wetting windows and removing dust and dirt around window frames and glass areas with a soft brush.

Step 2: Wetting the entire window and its frames with a soft washer and specialized window washing solutions.

Step 3: Scrubbing the windows thoroughly to remove dirt and dust.

Step 4: Spraying the glass cleaner and glass shiner to remove anything else that may have found its way to the surface of your window.

Step 5: Wetting the window again with our scrubber washer, in order to make sure it’s super cleaned.

Step 6: Wiping the edges, especially the frames in preparation for using the squeegee to dry your windows.

Step 7: Squeegee the window with a wiper, so all water and dirt will be wiped away. The process will be repeated if needed.

Step 8: Finally, the windows and frames will be cleaned with an absorbent microfibre cloth to ensure no streaks or spots are left.



Please note the following:

- Crew will inform and seek your approval before the use of scaffolding.

- Additional amount of scaffolding will be added to your booking details and will be charged as per the payment mode selected.

- Permits to be arranged in advance by the customer.

- Water and electricity supply to be provided by the customer.
options.description: Get shiny & spotless windows for the perfect fresh feeling

Step 5: Wetting the window again with our scrubber washer, in order to make sure it’s super cleaned.

Step 6: Wipping of the edges, especially the frames in preparation for using the squeegee to dry your windows.

Step 7: Squeegee the window with wiper, so all water and dirt will be wiped away. Process will be repeated again if needed.

Step 8 : Finally , the windows and frames will be cleaned with an absorbant micro fibre cloth to ensure no streaks or spots are left behind. 

 

NOTES:

- Crew will inform and seek you approval prior to the use of scaffolding.

- Additional amount of scaffolding will be added to your booking details and will be charged as per the payment mode selected.  

- Permits to be arranged in advance by the customer. 

- Water and electricity supply to be provided by the customer.
options.description: Detailed cleaning of your windows from the inside and outside

options.title: Studio Apartment
options.content:
Duration: 15 mins.

What is included:

  • Our professionals will bring all necessary materials for disinfection purposes (spraying machine, sanitizing solution, microfiber cloths, mask, overalls, gloves, and shoe covers) - a power outlet might be required to connect the machine.
  • All surfaces are first wiped down to remove any dust particles if necessary.
  • All surfaces are then sprayed with the sanitization solution and left to for 10 - 15 minutes to dissolve and get absorbed within the surface – no rinsing or wiping is required.
  • The final step is to wipe all wet areas where the sanitizer was sprayed if the client prefers.

Disinfectant Solution:
The solution is a mixture of water and disinfectant and is safe to use around children, pets, and on all surface types.

  • Vital Oxide or Bacoban
  • EPA registered
  • Dubai Municipality approved
  • Hospital-grade disinfectant
  • Kills 99.999% of bacteria and viruses
  • No-rinse or wipe required as it breaks down into simple salt-producing no harmful by-products

Recommendation:

  • Do a round of cleaning right before the disinfection.
  • All food left outside should be covered and placed in the fridge or inside cupboards during disinfection.
  • All windows and doors should be closed and AC turned off during the process as well as 15 - 20 minutes after the sanitization session is completed.
  • Do a disinfection service every 2 weeks.
options.description: In only 15 minutes get a 100% biosafe Municipality approved disinfection for your studio.

options.title: Apartment Cleaning
options.content:
Available / Recommended durations:

1 hour: 44 AED

2 hours: 78 AED (Recommended for Studio Apartment)

3 hours: 102 AED (Recommended for 1 BR Apartment)

4 hours: 156 AED (Recommended for 2 BR Apartment)

5 hours: 195 AED (Recommended for 3 BR Apartment)

6 hours: 234 AED (Recommended for 4 BR Apartment)

7 hours: 273 AED (Recommended for 5 BR Apartment)

8 hours: 312 AED (Recommended for 6 BR Apartment)

What is included:

  • Professionals will bring all the necessary materials for general cleaning (vacuum, mop & bucket, surface and floor cleaners, cleaning cloths).
  • General cleaning will involve organizing items, wiping and dusting down all surfaces, wiping light switches, door handles and window ledges, washing dishes, wiping kitchen appliances, cleaning bathtub, showers, toilets and bidet, making bed, vacuuming, mopping and taking out rubbish.
  • Professionals will bring all the necessary materials for disinfection purposes (machine, sanitizing solution, microfiber cloths, mask, overalls, gloves and shoe covers) – a power outlet might be required to connect the machine.
  • All surfaces are then sprayed and with the sanitization solution and left for 10 - 15 mins to dissolve and get absorbed within the surface – no rinsing or wiping is required.
  • The final step is to wipe all wet areas and dry the floors where the sanitizer was sprayed, if the client prefers.

Disinfectant Solution:
The solution is a mixture of water and disinfectant and is safe to use around children, pets, and on all surface types.

  • Vital Oxide or Bacoban
  • EPA registered
  • Dubai Municipality approved
  • Hospital-grade disinfectant
  • Kills 99.999% of bacteria and viruses
  • No-rinse or wipe required as it breaks down into simple salt-producing no harmful by-products

Recommendation:

  • Do a round of cleaning right before the disinfection.
  • All food left outside should be covered and placed in the fridge or inside cupboards during disinfection.
  • All windows and doors should be closed and AC turned off during the process as well as 15 - 20 minutes after the sanitization session is completed.
  • Do a disinfection service every 2 weeks.
options.description: A general cleaning before the disinfection service is highly recommended as the disinfectant solution works better on clean surfaces. It can further lower the risk of spreading infection.

options.title: 4 Hours Babysitting
options.content:
Duration: 4 hours 

Expert babysitting services at the comfort of your home or hotel day or night! All our babysitters are certified caregivers with pediatric first aid training & have a minimum of 2 years of childcare experience. They are trained to look after kids of all ages including newborns. Please fill the instructions box at check-out so we’re able to provide the best care for your precious little one.

What's included:

  • Care by a trained nanny that knows and understands your child’s needs and ensures his/her comfort.
  • Supervision for children of all ages and making sure their routine is not interrupted including diet, sleep patterns and developmental activities & structured play.
  • Feeding as guided by the parent.
  • Bathing and Diapering

Note:

  • Entry permits to be issued by the customer.
  • Please mention in the instructions box at the check-out if there are any kids below 2 years of age or any medical conditions or allergies the caregiver should be aware of.
  • An additional 70 AED will be applicable for bookings that end after 7pm.
  • Please note that 1 babysitter can provide the best care for 2 kids maximum and if there are more than 2 kids that require care we advise booking more than 1 caregiver.
  • Our caregivers are thoughtfully trained to provide the best standards of child care. House chores are not included as part of this service.
  • Nanny shall remain at the booking location with the child unless otherwise instructed at the sole responsibility of the parent.
  • Baby and child care products are not additionally provided.
options.description: Planning a date night or a spa session? You can enjoy your time worry-free while we take care of your child (click for more information)

options.content:

Package validity: 120 Days

Expert babysitting services anytime, anywhere!

Each session is designed to serve 4 hours per booking, any extra hours added to the booking will be charged additonal.

How sessions work:
1. Your first session will occur on the time and date you choose while buying the package.
2. You can schedule future sessions from your package by clicking on the bookings tab and going to Active Packages.
3. Under the active packages you will be able to see the package expiry date, the number of sessions remaining, and a redeem button which you can click to schedule your future booking.
4. Future sessions can be rescheduled at any time.

Please note:
1. Sessions will only be valid for 3 months from the date of the booking.
2. Upon canceling a session, a new session will be automatically created. However, a refund will not be issued.

options.title: Studio
options.content:
Guarantee a dispute-free refund of the deposit amount.

Number of Visits: 1
Inspection Duration: 1 Hour

What's included:

  • Structural Integrity: Examination of the walls, and other structural elements to identify any signs of damage or instability.
  • Electrical Systems: Assessment of the circuit breakers, outlets, and other electrical components to ensure safety and compliance with regulations.
  • Plumbing Systems: Inspection of plumbing fixtures, pipes, drains, water heaters, and sewage systems to detect leaks, blockages, or potential issues.
  • HVAC Systems: Evaluation of the Cooling, ventilation, and air conditioning systems to ensure proper functionality and energy efficiency.
  • Exterior: Inspection of the siding, windows, doors, decks, and other exterior elements to identify any damages or areas requiring maintenance.
  • Interior: Assessment of interior spaces, including walls, ceilings, floors, staircases, and built-in structures, to identify any visible issues such as issues with paint, tile, stone, joinery, glass, mirror, wallpaper, leather and more!

Upon completion of the inspection, a detailed report is generated, outlining findings, potential issues, recommendations, and photographs.


The report will be issued 24 hours after the inspection is completed

When Should this be done:
On the day of Move In/Move Out

Please note:

  • Permits need to be arranged by the client
  • The Inspector needs access to the entire property
  • Electricity, water, gas, and AC must be turned on.
  • Reports will be delivered once full payment is completed.
options.description: Our certified snagging inspector will carry out a detailed inspection of your studio apartment establishing the current condition of the property before the move-in of a new tenant or when a tenant moves out.

Upon completion of the inspection, a detailed report is generated, outlining findings, potential issues, recommendations, and photographs.

On the day of Move In/Move Out

  • The Inspector needs access to the entire property

While you enjoy your you-time, we will make sure that your pet is getting all the care and attention that they deserve. We work with top-rated premium mobile pet grooming salons in Dubai so that you can sit back and let your furry baby have all the fun.

options.content:

How it works:
1. Your first session will take place on the time and date you choose while buying the package
2. You can schedule future sessions from your package by clicking on the bookings tab and going to Active packages
3. Under Active packages you will be able to see the package expiry date, No. of sessions left and A redeem button which you can click to create your future booking
4. Future sessions can be re-scheduled or canceled at any time

Please note:
1. Sessions will only be valid for 3 months from the date of the booking
2. Upon canceling a session, a new session will be automatically created. However, a refund will not be issued.
